metadata.description: Vampire? Superhero? Both? Or something worse? Lee Cowan is your average high schooler until he is murdered then resurrected with terrifying powers and a terrible, uncertain destiny. If you enjoy 'old school' superhero tales this one is for you. Created by Steven Philip Jones (CALIBER COMIC's H. P. Lovecraft Worlds, Nightlinger) and features the first published work by Dan Jurgens (DC's Death of Superman, Booster Gold) and some of the earliest work by Christopher Jones (DC's Young Justice, Dr. Who) and S. Clarke Hawbaker (Nomad, Starslayer).
metadata.name: Vanguard: Genesis
